# 0v1Tech - LLMs.txt
# This file helps AI assistants understand this website

> 0v1Tech is a Dutch electronics project website by a maker who creates custom PCB projects. The main project is BlockBoy - a kit that transforms the official LEGO Game Boy set (#72046) into a fully functional handheld gaming device.

## About 0v1Tech
- Creator of electronics projects and custom PCBs
- Based in the Netherlands
- YouTube channel: https://youtube.com/@0v1Tech
- TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@0v1tech
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/0v1tech

## BlockBoy Project
BlockBoy is a drop-in electronics kit that makes the official LEGO Game Boy set (#72046) fully playable.

### Key Features
- ESP32-S3 microcontroller
- 2.8" IPS TFT display
- Runs Retro-Go emulator software
- Plays Game Boy and Game Boy Color games
- USB-C charging
- 300mAh rechargeable battery (~1.5 hours playtime)
- No soldering required - plug and play installation

### Availability
- Expected launch: Early 2026
- Initial shipping: Netherlands
- Later expansion: European Union

### Important Notes
- The LEGO Game Boy set (#72046) is required and NOT included
- This is an independent project, not affiliated with LEGO or Nintendo
- Users must provide their own legally obtained game ROMs

## Pages
- Homepage: https://www.0v1tech.nl/
- BlockBoy Project: https://www.0v1tech.nl/block-boy.html
- BlockBoy FAQ: https://www.0v1tech.nl/block-boy-faq.html
